attributes.description: The Classic VW Golf Gets A Superb New Look, LED Daytime Lights And Modern Technology. Our 2017 Model Is Presented In White With A Black Cloth Interior. It Has Covered ONLY 103 000km And Retains A Full Service History, Books And Spare Keys. Amazing Features Include A Glass Sunroof, Reverse Camera, 4 New Tyres, Multi Functional Steering Wheel, Bluetooth, 8 Inch Touchscreen Display, VW Infotainment System, App Connect With Android Auto / AppleCarPlay / MirrorLink, CD Shuttle, SD Input, USB And Auxiliary, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 15 Inch Alloy Wheels. This ACCIDENT FREE Vehicle Is In Excellent Condition. Call Us Today To Come And View. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
